title: Some observations made upon the root called serapias or salep, imported from Turkey shewing its admirable virtues in preventing womens miscarriages / written by a Doctor of Physick in the countrey to his friend in London.
author: Peachi, John, fl. 1683.
notes: Attributed also to John Pechey--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
